title: Enhancing Practical Software Development Competencies: University Learning Improvement Workshop Utilizing Digital Technology

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Develop at least three learning design strategies using digital technology to prepare for lab activities and class participation
Establish and implement strategies to enhance learner interaction and collaboration using digital tools
Design a feedback management system in digital environments to improve learner engagement by at least 20%
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
